    ! obsolete

:SPUpdate SpaceVim
    https://spacevim.org/documentation/#update-spacevim-itself
    https://github.com/SpaceVim/SpaceVim/issues/1212
        git checkout . on ~/.SpaceVim

:h
    SpaceVim-options

inst
curl -sLf https://spacevim.org/install.sh | bash

files
~/.vim -> ~/.SpaceVim/

templates/custom cfg
~/.SpaceVim.d/init.toml

prj-specific
$prjFoler/.SpaceVim.d/init.toml

cfg
https://spacevim.org/documentation/#custom-configuration
https://spacevim.org/documentation/#bootstrap-functions

rtp
:set rtp?
:set runtimepath?

custom-plugins
.cache/vimfiles/repos
